create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_COLLECT_IPCTRL2 minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_COLLECT_ANSWER minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_REMINDINFO minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_TEMPLATE minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 146 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_SITE minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_DOCSOURCE minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_CHANNEL minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_EXTFIELD minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TL_CMS_DOC_OPER_LOG minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 10 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_DOC_TASK minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_DOC_ATTACH minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_DOCUMENT minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_VOTE_ITEMS minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_VOTE_QUESTIONS minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_VOTE_TITLE minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 194 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_VOTE_TIMECTRL minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 2313 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_VOTE_IPCTRL minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_VOTE_ANSWER minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 2 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_COLLECT_TITLE minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 4 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_DOC_TEMPLATE minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 2 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_DOC_COMMENT minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 100 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_DOCCOMMENT_DICT minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 100 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_SITE_SEARCH minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 2 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_MAILSERVERINFO minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 2 increment by 1 nocache
create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_TEMPLATE_STYLE minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 2 increment by 1 nocache

create sequence SEQ_TD_CMS_DOCCOM_IMPEACHINFO minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999999999999999 start with 2 increment by 1 nocache
create or replace view V_DOC_FLOW_TRANS as select a.*,b.src_status,b.dest_status from TB_CMS_FLOW_DOC_TRANS a inner join TB_CMS_DOC_STATUS_TRANS b on a.transision_id = b.id

create or replace view V_TD_CMS_DOCUMENT as select a.*, case when parent_detail_tpl='0' then detailtemplate_id else (select detail_tpl_id from td_cms_channel b where b.channel_id=a.channel_id) end detail_tpl_id from td_cms_document a
create unique index IDX_SRC_DEST on TB_CMS_DOC_STATUS_TRANS ( DEST_STATUS ASC, SRC_STATUS ASC )
create index vhits_docid on TD_CMS_VIDIO_HITS(doc_id)
create index vhits_channelid on TD_CMS_VIDIO_HITS(CHANNEL_ID)
create index vhits_siteid on TD_CMS_VIDIO_HITS(SITE_ID)
create index brwcounts_docid on TD_CMS_BROWSER_COUNTS(doc_id)
create index brwcounts_channelid on TD_CMS_BROWSER_COUNTS(CHANNEL_ID)
create index brwcounts_siteid on TD_CMS_BROWSER_COUNTS(SITE_ID)
create or replace type TYP_ID_NAME as OBJECT ( ID NUMBER, NAME VARCHAR(100) )
create or replace type TYP_ID_NAME_LIST as TABLE of TYP_ID_NAME
